nodes.text: An ascension cable was a type of grappling hook that was used during the Clone Wars. DC-15A blaster rifles, which saw widespread usage by the Grand Army of the Republic's clone troopers, were equipped with ascension cables. A grappling extension provided ascension cable functionality to a DC-17 hand blaster; Clone Captain Rex and ARC trooper Fives used the extension during the Battle of Ringo Vinda.
